data.event: The town was founded in 1899 as the Commissary of Fronteras, but did not become an independent municipality with its current name until August 28, 1916.

event.title: did not become an independent municipality with its current name until August 28, 1916

event.title: rose to the status of villa (town) on May 8, 1933

data.event: It rose to the status of villa (town) on May 8, 1933, and it was officially placed in the category of city relatively recently, on November 11, 1942.
